mapper.insert: insert into ms_external_recharge (id, md_user, client_id, biz_id, recharge_amout, req_time, callback_url, recharge_type ) values( #{id}, #{mdUser}, #{clientId}, #{bizId}, #{rechargeAmout}, #{reqTime}, #{callbackUrl}, #{rechargeType} )
mapper.select: select mer.id AS id, mer.md_user AS mdUser, mer.client_id AS clientId, mer.biz_id AS bizId, mer.recharge_amout AS rechargeAmout, mer.req_time AS reqTime, mer.callback_url AS callbackUrl, mer.recharge_type AS rechargeType from ms_external_recharge mer
